Articles.Content:
Basically what corrupt a wish foundation is where you make a wish and someone grants it but it has a twist.

For an example: I wish for a cookie!

Granted but the cookie was poisoned.

Ill go first.

I wish for a stable spaceplane!

First off, welcome to the forums!

Since we already have a thread for that game, I'll be closing this one. You may wish to continue in this thread, which has already been set aside for the same game as the one you're wanting to start.

Have a nice day!
